description: Computes local measurements of gyrification at thousands of points over the entire cortical surface.

input_surface.title: Input surface file
input_surface.description: Input surface file, typically lh.pial or rh.pial

close_sphere_size.title: Close sphere size
close_sphere_size.description: Use sphere of specified size in mm for morph closing operation (default: 15mm)

smooth_iters.title: Smooth iterations
smooth_iters.description: Smooth outer-surface specified number of iterations (default: 30)

step_size.title: Step size
step_size.description: Skip every specified number of vertices when computing lGI (default: 100)
